Instruction: If using fresh corn, cut the kernels off the cob. If using frozen corn, thaw it.
Halve the cherry tomatoes and finely chop the red onion and fresh basil.
In a large bowl, combine the corn kernels, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and fresh basil.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a refreshing and colorful side dish.
